title: Turpentine
summary: Turpentine (which is also called gum turpentine, spirit of turpentine, oil of turpentine, wood turpentine, terebenthene, terebinthine and  (colloquially) turps)[3] is a fluid obtained by the distillation of resin harvested from living trees, mainly pines.  Mainly used as a specialized solvent, it is also a source of material for organic syntheses.
